title: Week in Review: Most popular stories on GeekWire for the week of Aug. 11, 2024

description: I wasn’t sure what to expect when I attended a preview event on Wednesday for Mirra, a new virtual reality entertainment center opening later this month in Bellevue, Wash. Based on my earlier coverage, I figured there were two ways this could go: full arcade, or full cyberpunk. Instead, Mirra looks more like an upscale gastropub, with a full bar near the entrance and booths lining the walls. It’s impossible to mistake it for anything other than a VR venue, however, as the focus is squarely on Mirra’s central screen from the moment you walk in. It takes up most… Read More
title: Air hockey, kraken tentacles, and laser rhythm: Inside new virtual-reality entertainment venue Mirra
